## Security Policy

### Reporting a Vulnerability
- **Do not use GitHub issues for security reports.**
- Email: [2-craze-headmen@icloud.com](mailto:2-craze-headmen@icloud.com)
- We aim to acknowledge within 48 hours and target fixes within 90 days.

### Supported Versions
| Version | Supported |
|---------|-----------|
| 3.0.x   | ✅        |
| 2.1.x   | ⚠️        |
| 2.0.x   | ❌        |
| 1.0.x   | ❌        |
